trans-unit.resname: STA·1 | Approach of the Second Sun | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Approach of the Second Sun
trans-unit.target: 神日迫临

trans-unit.resname: STA·1 | Approach of the Second Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named CARDNAME this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put CARDNAME into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语是从你手上施放，且你本盘游戏中施放过另一个名称为CARDNAME的咒语，则你赢得这盘游戏。若否，则将CARDNAME置于其拥有者牌库顶数来第七张的位置，且你获得7点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·2 | Day of Judgment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Day of Judgment
trans-unit.target: 审判末日

trans-unit.resname: STA·2 | Day of Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: STA·2 | Day of Judgment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This must not become common knowledge. The consequences of such a spell are too great. Lock it away in the restricted archive, and destroy its record in the catalog."\n—Director Taiva, to Isabough
trans-unit.target: 「这绝不能成为公共知识。此类咒语后果难以收拾。务必将其锁入受限文库，并销毁目录中的记载。」 ～泰瓦馆长叮嘱伊瑟伯

trans-unit.source: Defiant Strike
trans-unit.target: 无畏挥击

trans-unit.resname: STA·3 | Defiant Strike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "For twelve days and twelve nights, Somat assailed the monster's shell. On the thirteenth morning, it cracked with the dawn."\n—*Heroics: A Book of Fables*
trans-unit.target: 「索马特不断敲击怪物甲壳，十二昼十二夜间从未中断。到了第十三天清晨，甲壳终于裂出曙光。」 ～*《勇行故事：寓言合辑》*

trans-unit.source: Divine Gambit
trans-unit.target: 神圣计策

trans-unit.resname: STA·4 | Divine Gambit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由对手操控的神器，生物或结界。该牌手可以将一张永久物牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "Evil is to be unshackled, not slain. Unlock your foe and release the miracle within."\n—Keevan, docent of Kollema Hall
trans-unit.target: 「邪恶需要释放，而非消灭。解开封印敌人的枷锁，展现其中的惊人奇迹。」 ～科玛学堂讲师基万

trans-unit.source: Ephemerate
trans-unit.target: 流光烁影

trans-unit.source: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.\nRebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。 弹回（如果你从你手上施放此咒语，于它结算时将之放逐。在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放此牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·6 | Gift of Estates | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gift of Estates
trans-unit.target: 献地

trans-unit.resname: STA·6 | Gift of Estates | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 如果某对手操控的地比你多，则从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张平原牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: STA·6 | Gift of Estates | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We asked for a home and received the world."\n—*Scroll of Nine Blessings*
trans-unit.target: 「我们祈求一处家园，却得到了整个世界。」 ～*《九福卷轴》*

trans-unit.source: Gods Willing
trans-unit.target: 众神意旨

trans-unit.resname: STA·7 | Gods Willing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)\nScry 1.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种颜色。目标由你操控的生物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。（它不能被该色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。） 占卜1。

trans-unit.source: Mana Tithe
trans-unit.target: 魔力什一税

trans-unit.resname: STA·8 | Mana Tithe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "The tyrant's bellow of rage trailed off into a whimper as the last of his fortune escaped his grasp."\n—*The Dethroner's Grimoire*
trans-unit.target: 「眼见最后一丝财富逐渐抽离手中，暴君的愤怒狂啸也慢慢变成低声啜泣。」 ～*《逆臣秘录》*

trans-unit.source: Revitalize
trans-unit.target: 再现活力

trans-unit.source: You gain 3 life.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 你获得3点生命。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Knight Kathryn closed her eyes, bracing herself for the end. When she opened them again, she stood triumphant over her foe."\n—Thadus the Healer, *Memoirs*
trans-unit.target: 「骑士凯萨琳闭紧双眼，准备好迎接生命最终时刻。但当她再次睁开时，却发现是她对手倒在脚下。」 ～治疗师萨都丝，*《回忆录》*

trans-unit.resname: STA·10 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swords to Plowshares
trans-unit.target: 化剑为犁

trans-unit.resname: STA·10 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。其操控者获得等同于其力量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·10 | Swords to Plowshares | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The blademaster turned his fury to his new foes: root rot and cabbage slugs."\n—*Myths and Miracles, Vol. VII*
trans-unit.target: 「大剑师转而将怒火发泄在新的敌人身上：腐根和菜虫。」 ～*《神话与奇迹》，卷七*

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Protection
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力的庇护

trans-unit.resname: STA·11 | Teferi's Protection | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)\nExile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 直到你的下一个回合，你的总生命不会改变，且你获得反一切保护异能。所有由你操控的永久物跃离。（它们在跃离期间视作不存在。于你的重置步骤中重置之前，它们跃回。） 放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: STA·12 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blue Sun's Zenith
trans-unit.target: 蓝阳当空

trans-unit.resname: STA·12 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle CARDNAME into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓X张牌。将CARDNAME洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: STA·12 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Five suns! Can you even imagine how complicated the orbital calculations must be? What I wouldn't give to tackle an equation like that!"\n—Zimone, Quandrix mage-student
trans-unit.target: 「五个太阳！你能想象这样轨道计算会有多复杂吗？真希望我能去处理这样的算式！」 ～量析修习法师琦梦

trans-unit.source: Brainstorm
trans-unit.target: 脑力激荡

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，然后将两张牌从你手上以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "Infinite ideas flow through the Multiverse, waiting for an open mind."\n—*The Biblioplex: An Introduction*
trans-unit.target: 「无数思绪在多重宇宙中流动，只待开明思想前去发现。」 ～*《茂典阁志：前言》*

trans-unit.source: Compulsive Research
trans-unit.target: 强制探寻

trans-unit.resname: STA·14 | Compulsive Research | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓三张牌。然后除非该牌手弃一张地牌，否则其弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Every Planeswalker remembers the first time their mind touched the staggering vastness of the Multiverse."\n—Kasmina
trans-unit.target: 「当思绪首度触碰广袤多重宇宙时感到的震撼，相信每位鹏洛客都不会忘记。」 ～克蜜娜

trans-unit.source: Counterspell
trans-unit.target: 反击咒语

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: "One need not know the specific details of a spell to suppress its effect. Simply rearrange the rules of the reality within which the spell operates."\n—Imbraham, Quandrix dean
trans-unit.target: 「至于压制咒语效果的具体细节也不用去了解。只需重新整理咒语作用实界内的规则就可实现。」 ～量析院长英巴罕

trans-unit.source: Memory Lapse
trans-unit.target: 记忆丧失

trans-unit.resname: STA·16 | Memory Lapse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它置于其拥有者的牌库顶，而非置入该牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "Where do our forgotten thoughts go? I knew once, but I can't remember."\n—Director Taiva, journal entry
trans-unit.target: 「那些遗忘的思绪都去到了哪里？我曾探见其踪迹，但也无从记起。」 ～泰瓦馆长，日志一笔

trans-unit.source: Mind's Desire
trans-unit.target: 心之所欲

trans-unit.resname: STA·17 | Mind's Desire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 将你的牌库洗牌。然后放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。 风暴（当施放此咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。）

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Shatter your opponent's spell with enough force, and you'll shatter their confidence with it."\n—*Tome of Obstructions*, marginalia
trans-unit.target: 「用足够的力量粉碎对手的咒语，还能一并粉碎对手的信心。」 ～*《障法巨著》*，旁批

trans-unit.source: Opt
trans-unit.target: 抉择

trans-unit.source: Scry 1.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 占卜1。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The wish most often granted is the wish to choose one's own destiny."\n—*Aethershrine*, inscription
trans-unit.target: 「最常被保佑的愿望，都是希冀能选择自身命运者。」 ～*《乙太祭祠》*，铭文

trans-unit.source: Strategic Planning
trans-unit.target: 战略计划

trans-unit.resname: STA·20 | Strategic Planning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "I can offer only information, young one. What path you choose is up to you."\n—Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios
trans-unit.target: 「年轻人，我只能提供信息。至于要走哪条路得你自己选。」 ～阿凯维沃圣法谕贾琦

trans-unit.source: Tezzeret's Gambit
trans-unit.target: 泰兹瑞的计策

trans-unit.resname: STA·21 | Tezzeret's Gambit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)\nDraw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。） 抓两张牌，然后增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Time Warp
trans-unit.target: 时间弯曲

trans-unit.resname: STA·22 | Time Warp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.source: "Chronomancers have a rather different definition of living in the moment."\n—*The Millennium Tome*
trans-unit.target: 「不同时间术士对于『活在当下』的定义各不相同。」 ～*《千年巨著》*

trans-unit.source: Whirlwind Denial
trans-unit.target: 疾风拒斥

trans-unit.resname: STA·23 | Whirlwind Denial | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
trans-unit.target: 对每个由对手操控的咒语或异能而言，除非其操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm."\n—*Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft*
trans-unit.target: 「如果他们想要如风暴般强袭你的宫殿，那你就必须化身风暴。」 ～*《皇家咒艺手册》*

trans-unit.source: Agonizing Remorse
trans-unit.target: 苦痛悔恨

trans-unit.resname: STA·24 | Agonizing Remorse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你从其手上选择一张非地牌或从其坟墓场中选择一张牌。放逐该牌。你失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Guilt is not absolution. Regret is not justice. But it is right that you suffer."\n—Extus Narr
trans-unit.target: 「内疚不是解脱。后悔也非正义。但你理应受苦。」 ～埃陀斯纳尔

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crux of Fate
trans-unit.target: 命途交错

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Destroy all Dragon creatures.\n• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •消灭所有龙生物。 •消灭所有非龙生物。

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One brother fought for the sake of the Multiverse. The other for himself."\n—*The Elderspell Parable*
trans-unit.target: 「兄弟争斗：一位心系多重宇宙，另一位只为自身称雄。」 ～*《至尊咒寓言》*

trans-unit.source: Dark Ritual
trans-unit.target: 黑暗祭礼

trans-unit.resname: STA·26 | Dark Ritual | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Add {B}{B}{B}.
"They distrust my methods, but when they want results, whom do you think they seek?"\n—*Incantations of Lim-Dûl*
trans-unit.target: 「他们不相信我的方法，但当他们想要结果时，你猜又会去找谁？」 ～*《林杜咒文集》*

trans-unit.source: Demonic Tutor
trans-unit.target: 邪魔导师

trans-unit.resname: STA·27 | Demonic Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Demons prefer to deal with those who believe themselves too wise to be fooled."\n—Scroll case inscription
trans-unit.target: 「自以为绝顶聪明不会受骗者，正是恶魔青睐的交易对手。」 ～卷轴盒铭文

trans-unit.source: Doom Blade
trans-unit.target: 送终刀锋

trans-unit.resname: STA·28 | Doom Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: "An angel can shine like the sun, inspire the weak, and even threaten victory over darkness. But in the end it matters not, for it still dies like any other pest."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「天使能如阳光耀世，能鼓舞弱者，甚至可能战胜黑暗。但最终这一切都不重要，因为他们也会像害虫般死去。」 ～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.source: Duress
trans-unit.target: 逼从

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物且非地的牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: "Magic brought peace to the Vastlands but was soon corrupted."\n—*The Mystic Age: A Saga of Spells*
trans-unit.target: 「魔法曾给过旷土和平，但很快就被腐化。」 ～*《神秘时代：咒法传》*

trans-unit.source: Eliminate
trans-unit.target: 涤除

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: "It takes so little energy to erase a person. It's almost like the universe doesn't care that they existed at all."\n—Extus Narr
trans-unit.target: 「彻底抹除一个人根本不费什么工夫。看似宇宙根本不在乎他们是否存在。」 ～埃陀斯纳尔

trans-unit.resname: STA·31 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inquisition of Kozilek
trans-unit.target: 寇基雷的审讯

trans-unit.resname: STA·31 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张法术力值等于或小于3的非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.resname: STA·31 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To dwell within the Blind Eternities is unthinkable. To encounter those who do could shatter the mind."\n—*Chronicle of the Titans*
trans-unit.target: 「深居黑暗虚空，此事根本无法想象：面会其间生灵，思绪便遭粉碎。」 ～*《巨物编年史》*

trans-unit.resname: STA·32 | Sign in Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sign in Blood
trans-unit.target: 以血立契

trans-unit.resname: STA·32 | Sign in Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓两张牌并失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·32 | Sign in Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's always my brightest students who make the worst decisions."\n—Shaile, Silverquill dean
trans-unit.target: 「作出最糟糕决定的，总是我那帮最聪明的学生。」 ～银毫院长莎依儿

trans-unit.source: Tainted Pact
trans-unit.target: 腐败协定

trans-unit.resname: STA·33 | Tainted Pact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你的牌库顶牌。除非它与另一张以此法放逐的牌同名，否则你可以将该牌置于你手上。重复此流程，直到你将某张牌置于你手上，或是你放逐了两张同名的牌为止。

trans-unit.resname: STA·34 | Tendrils of Agony | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tendrils of Agony
trans-unit.target: 苦痛卷须

trans-unit.resname: STA·34 | Tendrils of Agony | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手失去2点生命，且你获得2点生命。 风暴（当施放此咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Village Rites
trans-unit.target: 村民仪式

trans-unit.resname: STA·35 | Village Rites | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nDraw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "My colleagues revile the barbarity of the Blood Age, but I believe we have much to learn from the magics of endless war."\n—Embrose, Silverquill dean

trans-unit.source: Each player looks at the top five cards of their library and may reveal a land card and/or an instant or sorcery card from among them. Each player puts the cards they revealed this way into their hand and the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order. Each player gains 3 life.
Academic Probation
trans-unit.target: 留校察看

trans-unit.resname: STX·7 | Academic Probation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn.\n• Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •选择一个非地牌的名称。直到你的下一个回合，所有对手都不能施放具该名称的咒语。 •选择目标非地永久物。直到你的下一个回合，它不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。

trans-unit.source: Ageless Guardian
trans-unit.target: 永恒守护者

trans-unit.source: Ancient ruins dot the world of Arcavios, most older than Strixhaven itself and many still guarded by soldiers from the Blood Age, centuries after their deaths.
trans-unit.target: 阿凯维沃世界上古代遗迹星罗棋布，其中大多数的历史比斯翠海文学院本身都要悠久。虽然血腥时代距今已有数百年，其时士兵早已逝去，但如今他们仍在继续守卫这些遗迹。

trans-unit.source: Beaming Defiance
trans-unit.target: 光耀反抗

trans-unit.resname: STX·9 | Beaming Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物得+2/+2且获得辟邪异能。（它不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: "I've lived too long in my father's shadow. It's time to find my own light."\n—Killian, Silverquill mage-student
trans-unit.target: 「我已在父亲的阴影下活得太久。现在该去寻找属于自己的光明。」 ～银毫修习法师齐力安

trans-unit.source: Clever Lumimancer
trans-unit.target: 机敏辉光术士

trans-unit.target: 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "You're too dim to realize it, but you've already lost."
trans-unit.target: 「以你的愚蠢可能还没意识到：你已经输了。」

trans-unit.source: Combat Professor
trans-unit.target: 战斗教授

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你回合的战斗开始时，直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物得+1/+0且获得警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: "Before Yovus was cut down at Pranticle Peak, she performed which maneuver? Anyone? From the reading?"
trans-unit.target: 「尤娲在潘迪科峰上被砍倒之前，她使出的是哪一招？谁来回答一下？书里写过喔。」

trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。 •消灭目标力量等于或大于4的生物。

trans-unit.source: Curate
trans-unit.target: 悉心布置

trans-unit.source: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序放回你的牌库顶。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "*Kathorran War Chants, Vol. III*? That doesn't even belong in this wing!"
trans-unit.target: 「*《卡瑟朗战歌，卷三》*？这书根本就不属于这一区！」

trans-unit.resname: STX·41 | Divide by Zero | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Divide by Zero
trans-unit.target: 除数归零

trans-unit.resname: STX·41 | Divide by Zero | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target spell or permanent with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand.\nLearn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或大于1的咒语或永久物移回其拥有者手上。 温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: STX·41 | Divide by Zero | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Misery. Inadequacy. Failure. The common denominator is you."
trans-unit.target: 「悲剧。不足。失败。它们的公分母都是你。」

trans-unit.source: Dream Strix
trans-unit.target: 眠梦枭

trans-unit.resname: STX·42 | Dream Strix | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME成为咒语的目标时，将它牺牲。 当CARDNAME死去时，温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: Frost Trickster
trans-unit.target: 冰霜诈术师

trans-unit.resname: STX·43 | Frost Trickster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: The most important skill in a Mage Tower match is keeping one's cool.
trans-unit.target: 斗法塔比赛中，最重要的技巧是保持冷静。

trans-unit.source: Ingenious Mastery
trans-unit.target: 匠心奇技

trans-unit.resname: STX·44 | Ingenious Mastery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may pay {2}{U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nIf the {2}{U} cost was paid, you draw three cards, then an opponent creates two Treasure tokens and they scry 2. If that cost wasn't paid, you draw X cards.
trans-unit.target: 你可以支付{2}{U}，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。 如果曾支付此{2}{U}费用，则你抓三张牌，然后任一对手派出两个珍宝衍生物且其占卜2。如果并非支付此费用，则你抓X张牌。

trans-unit.source: Kelpie Guide
trans-unit.target: 骏妖向导

trans-unit.resname: STX·45 | Kelpie Guide | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Untap another target permanent you control.\n{T}: Tap target permanent. Activate only if you control eight or more lands.
trans-unit.target: {T}：重置另一个目标由你操控的永久物。 {T}：横置目标永久物。只能于你操控八个或更多地时起动。

trans-unit.source: Kelpies are drawn to paradoxes, making them ideal companions for Quandrix mages.
trans-unit.target: 骏妖天生就会被矛盾事物吸引，这点让它们成为量析法师的理想旅伴。

trans-unit.source: Mentor's Guidance
trans-unit.target: 导师指引

trans-unit.resname: STX·46 | Mentor's Guidance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, copy it if you control a planeswalker, Cleric, Druid, Shaman, Warlock, or Wizard.\nScry 1, then draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，如果你操控鹏洛客，僧侣，德鲁伊，祭师，邪术师或法术师，则复制该咒语。 占卜1，然后抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Kasmina had encouraged the twins to apply. Strixhaven would test not only their magical potential, but also their character.
trans-unit.target: 克蜜娜鼓励冰火双子申请进入斯翠海文学院深造：这里不仅能考验他们的魔法潜能，还可锤炼他们的人格品质。

trans-unit.source: Mercurial Transformation
trans-unit.target: 多变转化术

trans-unit.resname: STX·47 | Mercurial Transformation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target nonland permanent loses all abilities and becomes your choice of a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1 or a blue Octopus creature with base power and toughness 4/4.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标非地永久物失去所有异能，且依照你的选择成为基础力量与防御力为1/1的蓝色蛙生物或基础力量与防御力为4/4的蓝色章鱼生物。

trans-unit.source: "For sun's sake, I just want a crab!"
trans-unit.target: 「太阳在上，我只想变出一只蟹！」

trans-unit.source: Multiple Choice
trans-unit.target: 多重选项

trans-unit.resname: STX·48 | Multiple Choice | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.
If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.
If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.
trans-unit.target: 如果X为1，则占卜1，然后抓一张牌。 如果X为2，则你可以选择一位牌手。他将一个由其操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。 如果X为3，则派出一个4/4，蓝红双色的元素衍生生物。 如果X等于或大于4，则以上皆作。

trans-unit.source: Pop Quiz
trans-unit.target: 随堂测试

trans-unit.resname: STX·49 | Pop Quiz | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.\nLearn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。 温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: "Today is hydromancy? I thought it was amplimancy! I studied for amplimancy!"
trans-unit.target: 「今天是考水文占卜？我以为是考增效术！我都在念增术！」

trans-unit.source: Reject
trans-unit.target: 驳回

trans-unit.source: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {3}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标生物或鹏洛客咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它放逐，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "Grux, for the last time, you have to do more than simply shout 'Apply!' at the administrators."\n—Pavil, admissions officer
trans-unit.target: 「葛兹，我最后一次告诉你：光对招生老师大叫『我要报名！』我们是绝对不会录取你的。」 ～招生委员帕威

trans-unit.source: Resculpt
trans-unit.target: 重新雕塑

trans-unit.source: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标神器或生物。其操控者派出一个4/4，蓝红双色的元素衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.
trans-unit.target: 评委先是为这元素的绝伦优雅倾倒，而后被它的数记重拳击倒。

trans-unit.source: Serpentine Curve
trans-unit.target: 蛇状曲线

trans-unit.resname: STX·52 | Serpentine Curve | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is one plus the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个0/0，绿蓝双色的分灵衍生生物。在其上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为在放逐区和你的坟墓场中由你拥有之瞬间和法术这两类牌的总数加一。

trans-unit.source: "Math bites."\n—Bim, Lorehold mage-student
trans-unit.target: 「数学会咬人。」 ～衡鉴修习法师毕姆

trans-unit.source: Snow Day
trans-unit.target: 冰雪蔽日

trans-unit.resname: STX·53 | Snow Day | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.\nDraw two cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置至多两个目标生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Advanced Elemental Manifestations is canceled until all students have thawed."\n—Prismari dormitory notice
trans-unit.target: 「高等元素具现学课程即日取消，复课日期待学生解冻后另行通知。」 ～粹丽寝室公告

trans-unit.resname: STX·54 | Solve the Equation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Solve the Equation
trans-unit.target: 解出算式

trans-unit.resname: STX·54 | Solve the Equation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张瞬间或法术牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: STX·54 | Solve the Equation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zimone's brilliance drew attention from many, including the sinister mages known as the Oriq.
trans-unit.target: 琦梦的横溢才华引起诸方关注，包括欧理可那群恶法师。

trans-unit.source: Soothsayer Adept
trans-unit.target: 预言专家

trans-unit.resname: STX·55 | Soothsayer Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: One of the first lessons divination students learn is how to recognize the difference between a portent and a simple surface ripple.
trans-unit.target: 在占卜学最初的几堂课上，学生们主要学习如何区分水面涟漪是否含有预示征兆。

trans-unit.source: Symmetry Sage
trans-unit.target: 匀衡智者

trans-unit.resname: STX·56 | Symmetry Sage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nMagecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target creature you control has base power 2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，目标由你操控的生物之基础力量为2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "By my calculations, I should be able to achieve true enlightenment before graduation."
trans-unit.target: 「根据我的计算，我应能在毕业之前获致真正启蒙。」

trans-unit.resname: STX·57 | Teachings of the Archaics | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teachings of the Archaics
trans-unit.target: 古旅人教诲

trans-unit.resname: STX·57 | Teachings of the Archaics | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw two cards. Draw three cards instead if an opponent has at least four more cards in hand than you.
trans-unit.target: 如果某对手的手牌比你多，则你抓两张牌。如果某对手的手牌比你至少多四张，则改为你抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: STX·57 | Teachings of the Archaics | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mages seek out the ancient beings known as the Archaics for their boundless knowledge of history and magic, dispensed only in cryptic metaphors.
trans-unit.target: 远古生灵古旅人遗世绝俗，其历史与魔法造诣深不可测，故而吸引众多法师苦寻其下落一求真知，到头却只收获晦涩难懂的神秘比喻。

trans-unit.resname: STX·58 | Tempted by the Oriq | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tempted by the Oriq
trans-unit.target: 受惑欧理可

trans-unit.resname: STX·58 | Tempted by the Oriq | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 为每位对手各进行以下流程～获得至多一个目标由其操控且法术力值等于或小于3的生物或鹏洛客之操控权。

trans-unit.resname: STX·58 | Tempted by the Oriq | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To exact his vengeance, Extus needed followers. His infiltrators recruited promising mage-students from the very halls he sought to destroy.
trans-unit.target: 埃陀斯需要更多人手才能实现他的复仇大计。于是他派渗透者深入自己意图破坏的各处学堂，就地招募有为修习法师来实施计划。

trans-unit.resname: STX·59 | Test of Talents | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Test of Talents
trans-unit.target: 试炼才能

trans-unit.resname: STX·59 | Test of Talents | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标瞬间或法术咒语。从其操控者的坟墓场、手牌及牌库中搜寻任意数量与该咒语同名的牌，并将它们放逐。该牌手洗牌，然后每有一张以此法放逐的手牌，他便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Vortex Runner
trans-unit.target: 漩涡奔越者

trans-unit.resname: STX·60 | Vortex Runner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as you control eight or more lands, CARDNAME gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控八个或更多地，CARDNAME便得+1/+0且不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "By using the vortex, I can study for at least fifteen extra minutes between every class. I wasn't being reckless, Dean Imbraham. I was being efficient."
trans-unit.target: 「借助漩涡，我就能在每次课间至少空出十五分钟的学习时间。英巴罕院长，我这不是无谋，反而是在追求效率。」

trans-unit.source: Waterfall Aerialist
trans-unit.target: 瀑布舞空师

trans-unit.resname: STX·61 | Waterfall Aerialist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWard {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 守护{2}（每当此生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.source: Form and function in perfect unity.
trans-unit.target: 形式与功能的完美统一。

trans-unit.source: Wormhole Serpent
trans-unit.target: 虫洞巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: STX·62 | Wormhole Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: After drownings, devourings, and one highly unpleasant algae infestation, unsupervised portal use on campus was banned.
trans-unit.target: 自从多次溺水、吞噬事故和一次令人极度不快的野藻入侵后，学校当即禁止学生在未经监督的情况下开启传送通道。

trans-unit.source: Arrogant Poet
trans-unit.target: 傲慢诗人

trans-unit.resname: STX·63 | Arrogant Poet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则它获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "I would be kinder to my peers, Professor, but I simply don't have any."
trans-unit.target: 「教授，我也想对功力相若的人客气些，但就是遇不上。」

trans-unit.source: Baleful Mastery
trans-unit.target: 恶邪奇技

trans-unit.resname: STX·64 | Baleful Mastery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nIf the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card.\nExile target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 你可以支付{1}{B}，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。 如果曾支付此{1}{B}费用，则任一对手抓一张牌。 放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: Brackish Trudge
trans-unit.target: 盐碱楚吉兽

trans-unit.resname: STX·65 | Brackish Trudge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{1}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you gained life this turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。只能于你获得过生命的回合中起动。

trans-unit.source: Most trudges are covered with decaying plant matter, making them ideal breeding grounds for fungal spores.
trans-unit.target: 大多数楚吉兽背上都覆有一片腐植层，令它们成为培养真菌孢子的最佳选择。

trans-unit.source: Callous Bloodmage
trans-unit.target: 冷酷血涌法师

trans-unit.resname: STX·66 | Callous Bloodmage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Exile target player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～ •派出一个1/1，黑绿双色的害虫衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，你获得1点生命。」 •你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。 •放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: STX·67 | Confront the Past | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Confront the Past
trans-unit.target: 正视过往

trans-unit.resname: STX·67 | Confront the Past | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Return target planeswalker card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.\n• Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •将目标法术力值等于或小于X的鹏洛客牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 •从目标由对手操控的鹏洛客上移去两倍于X数量的忠诚指示物。

trans-unit.resname: STX·67 | Confront the Past | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why, Gideon? Of all people, why save me?"
trans-unit.target: 「为什么，基定？为什么茫茫众生，你偏偏救了我？」

trans-unit.source: Crushing Disappointment
trans-unit.target: 极度失望

trans-unit.resname: STX·68 | Crushing Disappointment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各失去2点生命。你抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Most students could barely endure Dean Embrose's scrutiny for a semester or two; Killian lived with it his entire life.
trans-unit.target: 面对安博斯院长的百般挑剔，大多数学生连一两个学期都忍不下去；但齐力安却得忍受一辈子。

trans-unit.source: Essence Infusion
trans-unit.target: 灌输菁华

trans-unit.resname: STX·69 | Essence Infusion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。它获得系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "I'd say it's still a fair fight—now my friend is about the size of your ego."
trans-unit.target: 「我觉得这还算是公平对决～现在我朋友已经跟你的自尊一样大了。」

trans-unit.source: Eyetwitch
trans-unit.target: 巨眼蝠

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME死去时，温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: Oculomancers see the ideal potion ingredient. The bats don't see it that way.
trans-unit.target: 在视像术士眼中，这是理想的药剂配方。但在巨眼蝠眼中，它们可不这么想。

trans-unit.source: Flunk
trans-unit.target: 成绩砸锅

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 7 minus the number of cards in that creature's controller's hand.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为7减去该生物操控者的手牌数量。

trans-unit.source: "I assure you, no one fails my course more than once."\n—Embrose, Silverquill dean
trans-unit.target: 「我向你保证，我的课最多只会不及格一次。」 ～银毫院长安博斯

trans-unit.source: Go Blank
trans-unit.target: 头脑空白

trans-unit.resname: STX·72 | Go Blank | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player discards two cards. Then exile that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手弃两张牌。然后放逐该牌手坟墓场中的所有牌。

trans-unit.source: The only feeling worse than not knowing the answer is the certainty that you once did.
trans-unit.target: 比现在解不出题目更难受的，是你确信自己此前解出过同一题。

trans-unit.resname: STX·73 | Hunt for Specimens | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: STX·74 | Lash of Malice | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: STX·74 | Lash of Malice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The strongest shadow spells come from disdain for someone else, not frustration with yourself."\n—Embrose, Silverquill dean
trans-unit.target: 「最强大的黯影咒语源自蔑视他人，而非自我悔恨。」 ～银毫院长安博斯

trans-unit.source: Leech Fanatic
trans-unit.target: 弄蛭狂徒

trans-unit.resname: STX·75 | Leech Fanatic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, CARDNAME has lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，CARDNAME便具有系命异能。

trans-unit.source: "Everyone thinks that leeches maintain a strictly sanguivorous diet, but in fact, most freshwater leeches are carnivores. Wait, where are you going?"
trans-unit.target: 「所有人都以为蚂蟥仅摄食血液，但实际上大多数的淡水水蛭也具有肉食习性。等等，你们怎么都走了？」

trans-unit.source: Mage Hunter
trans-unit.target: 猎法妖

trans-unit.resname: STX·76 | Mage Hunter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts or copies an instant or sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，其失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: One of the Oriq's most powerful tools is the mage hunter, a vile monstrosity created to seek out and snuff out the arcane.
trans-unit.target: 猎法妖是专为找出并掐灭秘法来源而创造出来的恶毒怪物，因此它们算得上欧理可众手中的最强武器。

trans-unit.resname: STX·77 | Mage Hunters' Onslaught | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mage Hunters' Onslaught
trans-unit.target: 猎法妖猛攻

trans-unit.resname: STX·77 | Mage Hunters' Onslaught | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.\nWhenever a creature blocks this turn, its controller loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。 本回合中，每当一个生物进行阻挡时，其操控者失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STX·77 | Mage Hunters' Onslaught | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Extus stood before his alma mater for a moment, remembering first his studies, then his vengeance. At his command, the mage hunters unfolded.
trans-unit.target: 埃陀斯驻足母校门前，心中澎湃的先是校园回忆，然后很快变成复仇恨意。随着他一声令下，猎法妖蜂拥而出。

trans-unit.source: Necrotic Fumes
trans-unit.target: 溃疽烟气

trans-unit.resname: STX·78 | Necrotic Fumes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature you control.\nExile target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 放逐一个由你操控的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: When live specimens aren't readily available, Witherbloom mages make creative use of ragged spirits clinging to long-dead bodies.
trans-unit.target: 当手头没有可用的活体标本时，靡华法师便活用仍留在久逝尸体上的破碎灵魂来作替代。

trans-unit.source: Novice Dissector

trans-unit.resname: STX·79 | Novice Dissector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲另一个生物：在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: "The professor said to first extract the venom glands, then the acid sac. Next up, the . . . meeping organ?"
trans-unit.target: 「教授说先摘除毒腺，然后再取下酸囊。下一步是…发声结？」

trans-unit.source: Oriq Loremage
trans-unit.target: 欧理可典法师

trans-unit.resname: STX·80 | Oriq Loremage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. If it's an instant or sorcery card, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，将它置入你的坟墓场，然后洗牌。如果它是瞬间或法术牌，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Nothing can quell the Oriq's thirst for the forbidden secrets of the past.
trans-unit.target: 没有什么能够浇灭欧理可众对于过往禁忌秘密的渴望。

trans-unit.resname: STX·81 | Plumb the Forbidden | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 尝试禁法

trans-unit.resname: STX·81 | Plumb the Forbidden | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice one or more creatures. When you do, copy this spell for each creature sacrificed this way.\nYou draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 你可以牺牲一个或数个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。当你如此作时，每以此法牺牲一个生物，便将此咒语复制一次。 你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STX·81 | Plumb the Forbidden | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Strixhaven forbade all magic from the Blood Age, so that is where Extus began his research.
trans-unit.target: 斯翠海文禁止使用血腥时代的任何魔法，于是埃陀斯的研究从此开始。

trans-unit.source: Poet's Quill

Professor Onyx
trans-unit.target: 黑玉教授

trans-unit.resname: STX·83 | Professor Onyx | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
[+1]: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
[−3]: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.
[−8]: Each opponent may discard a card. If they don't, they lose 3 life. Repeat this process six more times.
trans-unit.target: 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，每位对手各失去2点生命，且你获得2点生命。 +1：你失去1点生命。检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。 −3：每位对手各牺牲一个生物，且须是由其操控的生物中力量最大者。 −8：每位对手各可以弃一张牌。若其未如此作，则其失去3点生命。将此流程再重复六次。

trans-unit.source: Professor Onyx urged the twins to prepare for the dark mage Extus, sounding very much like someone familiar with the rise of tyrants.
trans-unit.target: 黑玉教授提醒冰火双子对黑暗法师埃陀斯早作准备，口气听起来仿佛就像她自己亲历过暴君崛起一样。

trans-unit.source: "Your technique is sloppy, but there is talent there. Do it again, and keep your right arm in position this time."
trans-unit.target: 「你虽然技艺粗糙，但也还算是可塑之材。再作一次，这次记得把右手摆正位置。」

trans-unit.source: The sport of Mage Tower was conceived as a playful testing ground for young spellcasters.

trans-unit.source: "Don't look at me like that. It was either this or being eaten by a groff."\n—Dina, Witherbloom mage-student

trans-unit.source: "I'll show you original research, you hack!"
trans-unit.target: 「让我给你瞧瞧真正的原创研究，你个代写枪手！」

trans-unit.source: "The Founder Dragons weren't even hatched when this scroll was written!"
trans-unit.target: 「这张卷轴写就时，创院巨龙都还没孵出来呢！」

trans-unit.target: 虽然他手下部队数百年前就已攻占瑟盾要塞，但他仍在沙场征战。

trans-unit.target: 看着萝婉不断地从斯翠海文魔旋中汲取原始魔力，威尔不由得屏住呼吸。在一瞬之间，只见萝婉通体红光闪耀，宛若毁灭神下凡。

If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.\nExile CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: "If the pen is mightier than the sword, just think what a giant tome could do!"

trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张牌离开你的坟墓场时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Some spirits share ancient wisdom. Others just get mad you touched their stuff.
trans-unit.target: 有的魂灵乐于分享古代智慧。而有的则会因你乱碰私物而动怒。

trans-unit.source: Grinning Ignus
trans-unit.target: 蔑笑火灵

trans-unit.resname: STX·104 | Grinning Ignus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}, Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {R}，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上：加{C}{C}{R}。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: On rare occasions, a Prismari student will summon an elemental that shows such promise that it's permitted to stay and enroll.
trans-unit.target: 有的时候，粹丽学生能够召唤出颇具天资的元素，令到学院破格准许它们留存甚至入学。不过这极其罕见。

trans-unit.source: Hall Monitor
trans-unit.target: 学堂监卫

trans-unit.resname: STX·105 | Hall Monitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\n{1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {1}{R}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "No unauthorized summoning. No writing in the library books. And absolutely no indoor dueling!"
trans-unit.target: 「未经许可禁止召唤。馆藏书籍禁止涂写。绝对不准室内决斗！」

trans-unit.source: Heated Debate
trans-unit.target: 火热争辩

trans-unit.resname: STX·106 | Heated Debate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)\nCARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。（包括不能被守护异能反击。） CARDNAME对目标生物或鹏洛客造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "While you were wasting time with abstract equations, I mastered ancient Oggyar fire magic. Your move."
trans-unit.target: 「当你还在浪费时间解开抽象算式时，我早已掌握了古代欧格牙烈焰魔法。看你的了。」

trans-unit.source: Igneous Inspiration
trans-unit.target: 火灵启迪

trans-unit.resname: STX·107 | Igneous Inspiration | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target.\nLearn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。 温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: Prismari fosters a burning need to create.
trans-unit.target: 粹丽学院志在培育对创造的热切需求。

trans-unit.source: Illuminate History
trans-unit.target: 照亮历史

trans-unit.resname: STX·108 | Illuminate History | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
trans-unit.target: 弃任意数量的牌，然后抓等量的牌。然后如果你的坟墓场中有七张或更多牌，则派出一个3/2，红白双色的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Look at the detail in this stonework! Professor, our assumptions about early Kathorran tool use may not be correct."
trans-unit.target: 「看看这石雕细部的精妙处理！教授，也许我们对于卡瑟朗族早期使用工具的假设有误。」

trans-unit.source: Illustrious Historian
trans-unit.target: 显赫史家

trans-unit.resname: STX·109 | Illustrious Historian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}, Exile CARDNAME from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
trans-unit.target: {5}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：派出一个已横置的3/2，红白双色的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: The most distinguished Lorehold professors are eligible to receive extended tenure, even beyond the limits of their own mortality.
trans-unit.target: 衡鉴学院最杰出的教授有资格终身获聘，就算其业已离世也可继续任教。

trans-unit.source: Mascot Interception
trans-unit.target: 阻截苑像

trans-unit.resname: STX·110 | Mascot Interception | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature token.\nGain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以衍生生物为目标，则它减少{3}来施放。 获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。直到回合结束，它得+2/+0且获得敏捷异能。

trans-unit.source: Far from the trappings of royalty, Rowan and Will found inspiration from the most popular sport on campus, Mage Tower.
trans-unit.target: 在摆脱皇家礼典的束缚之后，萝婉和威尔能够积极参加校园内最受欢迎的运动项目～斗法塔，并从中收获大量灵感。

trans-unit.source: Pigment Storm
trans-unit.target: 染料风暴

trans-unit.resname: STX·111 | Pigment Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成5点伤害。过量伤害改为对该生物的操控者造成之。

trans-unit.source: When art projects collapse, Prismari students revel in the beauty of destruction. Everyone else runs for cover.
trans-unit.target: 当艺术作品轰然倒塌时，粹丽学生会在毁灭之美中尽情狂欢。而其他人则会慌忙寻找避难处。

trans-unit.source: Pillardrop Warden
trans-unit.target: 避柱护卫

trans-unit.resname: STX·112 | Pillardrop Warden | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Reach\n{2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 延势 {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: A giant statue of a dwarf is still a giant statue.
trans-unit.target: 巨型的矮人雕像，也算是巨人雕像。

trans-unit.source: Retriever Phoenix
trans-unit.target: 折返凤凰

trans-unit.resname: STX·113 | Retriever Phoenix | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)\nAs long as CARDNAME is in your graveyard, if you would learn, you may instead return CARDNAME to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你施放之，则温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。） 只要CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，如果你将温习，你便可以改为将CARDNAME移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: STX·114 | Start from Scratch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Start from Scratch
trans-unit.target: 从头开始

trans-unit.resname: STX·114 | Start from Scratch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.\n• Destroy target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。 •消灭目标神器。

trans-unit.resname: STX·114 | Start from Scratch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't care what they think!" Rootha snapped. "I know I can do better."
trans-unit.target: 「我不在乎他们怎么想！」如莎打断道，「我只知道我能做得更好。」

trans-unit.source: Storm-Kiln Artist
trans-unit.target: 暴风窑艺家

trans-unit.resname: STX·115 | Storm-Kiln Artist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.\nMagecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个神器，CARDNAME便得+1/+0。 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.source: A captured elemental makes for a potent, albeit unstable, power source.
trans-unit.target: 捕捉到的元素虽不稳定，但能够成为强大的能量来源。

trans-unit.source: Sudden Breakthrough
trans-unit.target: 突破进展

trans-unit.resname: STX·116 | Sudden Breakthrough | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.\nCreate a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+0且获得先攻异能。 派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: Rootha created constantly, passionately, in hopes of impressing her greatest critic: herself.
trans-unit.target: 如莎对每次创作都投入十二分的专注和热情，只为能让最挑剔她的批评家满意：她自己。

trans-unit.source: Tome Shredder
trans-unit.target: 毁卷狼

trans-unit.resname: STX·117 | Tome Shredder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\n{T}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {T}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张瞬间或法术牌：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Quintorius, would you care to explain why you didn't complete your homework?"\n—Augusta, Lorehold dean
trans-unit.target: 「昆托力，你能不能解释一下为何没完成作业？」 ～衡鉴院长欧歌塔

trans-unit.source: Twinscroll Shaman
trans-unit.target: 双轴焰祭师

trans-unit.resname: STX·118 | Twinscroll Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Double strike
trans-unit.target: 连击

trans-unit.source: "May your wretched name never grace the annals of history, you ignorant buffoon!"
trans-unit.target: 「祝你的丑陋名字永无法登诸年志之端，你个无知蠢货！」

trans-unit.source: Accomplished Alchemist
trans-unit.target: 高明炼金术士

trans-unit.resname: STX·119 | Accomplished Alchemist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.\n{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。 {T}：加X点任意颜色的单色法术力，X为你本回合中获得过的生命数量。

trans-unit.source: "Tincture of murkroot and lizard feet? Simple. One that doesn't taste like murkroot and lizard feet? I'm working on it."
trans-unit.target: 「黯根蜥爪酊？轻而易举。要喝起来没有黯根和蜥爪味的？正在研究。」

trans-unit.source: Basic Conjuration
trans-unit.target: 基础变换术

trans-unit.resname: STX·120 | Basic Conjuration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中的一张生物牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I made that! It's mine! Did you see that?"
trans-unit.target: 「那是我变的！是我变的！看到了吗？」

trans-unit.source: Bayou Groff
trans-unit.target: 河沼泽犬

trans-unit.resname: STX·121 | Bayou Groff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物或支付{3}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.source: "Groffs are great for tracking pests through the muck, but securing the pests before the groff devours them is a dicey endeavor."\n—Lisette, Witherbloom dean
trans-unit.target: 「虽然泽犬擅于穿梭淤泥间找到害虫下落，但要想在它们吞下之前把害虫救出来，就得冒着生命危险。」 ～靡华院长莉塞特

trans-unit.source: Big Play
trans-unit.target: 镇场绝技

trans-unit.resname: STX·122 | Big Play | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+2且获得延势异能。在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Quandrix is running out of time. If they're going to capture the Witherbloom mascot, they need something big here."\n—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator
trans-unit.target: 「留给量析队的时间不多了。如果他们想要抢下靡华队的苑像，他们得拿出镇住全场的本事。」 ～斗法塔赛评夸米克

trans-unit.source: Bookwurm
trans-unit.target: 噬书亚龙

trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.\n{2}{G}: Put CARDNAME from your graveyard into your library third from the top.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命且抓一张牌。 {2}{G}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场置于你牌库顶数来第三张的位置。

trans-unit.source: It takes "devouring a book in one sitting" to a frightening extreme.
trans-unit.target: 它把「一口气消化一本书」演绎到了惊人的极端。

trans-unit.source: Charge Through
trans-unit.target: 奋力突破

trans-unit.resname: STX·124 | Charge Through | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得践踏异能直到回合结束。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "What a move! Lorehold gets caught flat-footed, and Witherbloom barrels ahead."\n—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator
trans-unit.target: 「精彩突破！衡鉴队显得有点不知所措，靡华队趁机拉开距离。」 ～斗法塔赛评夸米克

trans-unit.source: Containment Breach
trans-unit.target: 围护破裂

trans-unit.resname: STX·125 | Containment Breach | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If its mana value is 2 or less, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。如果其法术力值等于或小于2，则派出一个1/1，黑绿双色的害虫衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，你获得1点生命。」

trans-unit.source: For pest keepers, there's no sound more disheartening than breaking glass.
trans-unit.target: 对害虫看守来说，最吓人的莫过于听到玻璃碎裂的声音。

trans-unit.source: Devouring Tendrils
trans-unit.target: 吞噬卷须

trans-unit.resname: STX·126 | Devouring Tendrils | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. When the permanent you don't control dies this turn, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。本回合中，当该不由你操控的永久物死去时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Witherbloom spells often take on the appearance—and personality—of their components.
trans-unit.target: 靡华咒语通常会保留其主要成分的外形～甚至天性。

trans-unit.source: Dragonsguard Elite
trans-unit.target: 菁英护龙卫

trans-unit.resname: STX·127 | Dragonsguard Elite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\n{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {4}{G}{G}：将CARDNAME上的+1/+1指示物数量加倍。

trans-unit.source: "The Founder Dragons brought the Blood Age to an end. It is an honor to serve them."
trans-unit.target: 「创院巨龙终结了血腥时代。能够侍奉他们是我的荣幸。」

trans-unit.source: Ecological Appreciation
trans-unit.target: 生态鉴赏

trans-unit.resname: STX·128 | Ecological Appreciation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library and graveyard for up to four creature cards with different names that each have mana value X or less and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Shuffle the chosen cards into your library and put the rest onto the battlefield. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库和坟墓场中搜寻至多四张名称各不相同的生物牌，且其法术力值均须等于或小于X，展示这些牌。任一对手选择其中两张牌。将所选之牌洗入你的牌库，其余则放进战场。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Emergent Sequence
trans-unit.target: 突发后果

trans-unit.resname: STX·129 | Emergent Sequence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. That land becomes a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature that's still a land. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each land you had enter the battlefield under your control this turn.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。该地成为0/0，绿蓝双色的分灵生物，且仍然是地。在其上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于本回合中在你操控下进战场的地数量。

trans-unit.source: Exponential Growth
trans-unit.target: 指数成长

trans-unit.resname: STX·130 | Exponential Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, double target creature's power X times.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，将目标生物的力量加倍X次。

trans-unit.source: Most Quandrix students fundamentally disagree with the concept of "enough."
trans-unit.target: 大多数量析学生都从根本上反对「适量」这一说法。

trans-unit.source: Field Trip
trans-unit.target: 实地考察

trans-unit.resname: STX·131 | Field Trip | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\nLearn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的树林牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。 温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: Fortifying Draught
trans-unit.target: 增势药剂

trans-unit.resname: STX·132 | Fortifying Draught | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 2 life. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
trans-unit.target: 你获得2点生命。目标生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为你本回合中获得过的生命数量。

trans-unit.source: "If a seedling can push through solid stone, there's no limit to what I could do."
trans-unit.target: 「如果连幼苗都能突破顽石自由成长，那我的能力便高无止境。」

trans-unit.source: Gnarled Professor
trans-unit.target: 糙节教授

trans-unit.resname: STX·133 | Gnarled Professor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: "Class is in season."
trans-unit.target: 「正当课季。」

trans-unit.source: Honor Troll
trans-unit.target: 求誉巨魔

trans-unit.resname: STX·134 | Honor Troll | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nIf you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.\nCARDNAME gets +2/+1 as long as you have 25 or more life.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 如果你将获得生命，则改为你获得原数量加1点生命。 只要你的总生命为25或更多，荣誉巨魔便得+2/+1。

trans-unit.source: First in his clan to attend Strixhaven, and now first in his class.
trans-unit.target: 他是曾是该部落第一位入学斯翠海文的巨魔，如今更是班上第一名。

trans-unit.source: Karok Wrangler
trans-unit.target: 鳄兽驯师

trans-unit.resname: STX·135 | Karok Wrangler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "She showed up to class on a what?"\n—Valentin, Witherbloom Dean
trans-unit.target: 「她是骑什么上学的来着？」 ～靡华院长瓦伦丁

trans-unit.source: Leyline Invocation
trans-unit.target: 地脉祝愿

trans-unit.source: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在目标由你操控的生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。由你操控的其他生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: His words poured forth on waves of golden light, scouring all fear from his audience's hearts and minds.
trans-unit.target: 他的言辞化作道道金光照耀众人，将听众心灵之间所有恐惧打消一空。

trans-unit.source: Expressive Iteration
trans-unit.target: 展现迭代

trans-unit.resname: STX·186 | Expressive Iteration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，一张置于你的牌库底，一张放逐。本回合中，你可以使用所放逐的牌。

trans-unit.source: Prismari students dance in the tension between passion and perfection.
trans-unit.target: 在激情与精进的张力之间，粹丽学生尽情起舞。

trans-unit.source: Fractal Summoning
trans-unit.target: 分灵召唤术

trans-unit.resname: STX·187 | Fractal Summoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个0/0，绿蓝双色的分灵衍生生物。在其上放置X个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Fractals are just pseudo-dimensional manifestations of asynchronous biosymmetries. It's really quite simple."\n—Kianne, Quandrix dean
trans-unit.target: 「分灵只不过是异步生物对称体在假维度空间下的具现。原理非常简单。」 ～量析院长齐安妮

trans-unit.source: Fracture
trans-unit.target: 裂成碎片

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器，结界或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: "Your defiance is amusing, little mage. It's time you learn how fragile you really are."\n—Extus Narr
trans-unit.target: 「年轻法师，你的反抗有点意思。现在你该了解自己实际上有多脆弱。」 ～埃陀斯纳尔

trans-unit.source: Galazeth Prismari
trans-unit.target: 加拉泽粹丽

trans-unit.resname: STX·189 | Galazeth Prismari | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.\nArtifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。 由你操控的神器具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放瞬间或法术咒语。」

trans-unit.source: Golden Ratio
trans-unit.target: 黄金比例

trans-unit.resname: STX·190 | Golden Ratio | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each different power among creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物中每有一种力量数值，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "When I look around, I see a world defined by patterns that still manages to defy them."\n—Kianne, Quandrix dean
trans-unit.target: 「我环顾四周，看到的是一个早已有无数规律定义，却还能不断打破规则的世界。」 ～量析院长齐安妮

trans-unit.source: Harness Infinity
trans-unit.target: 掌驭无垠

trans-unit.resname: STX·191 | Harness Infinity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exchange your hand and graveyard.\nExile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 交换你的手牌和坟墓场。 放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "As I stepped into the star arch, it all became perfectly clear. Life and death are not opposites, but an endless path, twisting around and back upon itself, never ending and never beginning."\n—Zhaer, professor of biophilosophy
trans-unit.target: 「我踏入星拱，一切都变得豁然开朗。生死并非对立两面，而是一条无尽通途。这条道路蜿蜒缠绕，最后连结一体，无所谓终，也无所谓始。」 ～生物哲学教授札依儿

trans-unit.source: Hofri Ghostforge
trans-unit.target: 铸魂霍非

trans-unit.resname: STX·192 | Hofri Ghostforge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's graveyard."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的精怪得+1/+1且具有践踏与敏捷异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品，但它额外具有精怪此类别，且具有「当此生物离开战场时，将所放逐之牌移回你的坟墓场。」

trans-unit.source: Humiliate
trans-unit.target: 恣意羞辱

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。在一个由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Aw, what's that? No comeback?"
trans-unit.target: 「喔，就这样？你不还嘴吗？」

trans-unit.resname: STX·194 | Infuse with Vitality | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Infuse with Vitality
trans-unit.target: 灌输活力

trans-unit.resname: STX·194 | Infuse with Vitality | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gains deathtouch and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."\nYou gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物获得死触异能与「当此生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下横置移回战场。」 你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STX·194 | Infuse with Vitality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dina raised her cup to Killian's lips, and for the first time in his life, he knew compassion.
trans-unit.target: 迪娜将杯子捧到齐力安嘴边，让他首度尝到受人同情的滋味。

trans-unit.source: Inkling Summoning
trans-unit.target: 墨灵召唤术

trans-unit.resname: STX·195 | Inkling Summoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个2/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的墨灵衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Think of an insult so vicious, so vulgar, that you hesitate to speak it aloud. The strongest, most aggressive inklings are born from such scorn."\n—Embrose, Silverquill dean
trans-unit.target: 「在心里想一句骂人的话。它要够恶毒、够粗俗、够难听，到你自己都不好意思大声骂出口的地步。最强大、最凶猛的墨灵，就是诞生自这种辱骂之中。」 ～银毫院长安博斯

trans-unit.resname: STX·196 | Kasmina, Enigma Sage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kasmina, Enigma Sage
trans-unit.target: 谜样智者克蜜娜

trans-unit.resname: STX·196 | Kasmina, Enigma Sage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of CARDNAME.
[+2]: Scry 1.
[−X]: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
[−8]: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的其他鹏洛客均具有CARDNAME的所有忠诚异能。 +2：占卜1。 −X：派出一个0/0，绿蓝双色的分灵衍生生物。在其上放置X个+1/+1指示物。 −8：从你的牌库中搜寻一张与此鹏洛客具共通颜色的瞬间或法术牌，放逐该牌，然后洗牌。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: STX·197 | Killian, Ink Duelist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Killian, Ink Duelist
trans-unit.target: 舞墨斗客齐力安

trans-unit.resname: STX·197 | Killian, Ink Duelist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nMenace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nSpells you cast that target a creature cost {2} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 系命 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） 你施放之以生物为目标的咒语减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: STX·197 | Killian, Ink Duelist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When your father is Dean Embrose, second best really isn't an option."
trans-unit.target: 「身为安博斯院长的儿子，我不能只屈居第二。」

trans-unit.source: Lorehold Apprentice
trans-unit.target: 衡鉴学徒

trans-unit.source: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, Spirit creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent."
trans-unit.target: 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，直到回合结束，由你操控的精怪生物获得「{T}：此生物向每位对手各造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.source: Ancient footfalls echo in her head, their timeless rhythm guiding the present.
trans-unit.target: 远古足音在她脑中回响，这段永恒踢踏节奏正指引当下发展。

trans-unit.source: Lorehold Command
trans-unit.target: 衡鉴指命

trans-unit.resname: STX·199 | Lorehold Command | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose two —
• Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn.
• CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life.
• Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～ •派出一个3/2，红白双色的精怪衍生生物。 •直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+1/+0且获得不灭与敏捷异能。 •CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。目标牌手获得3点生命。 •牺牲一个永久物，然后抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Lorehold Excavation
trans-unit.target: 衡鉴挖掘

trans-unit.resname: STX·200 | Lorehold Excavation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, mill a card. If a land card was milled this way, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)\n{5}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，磨一张牌。若以此法磨掉一张地牌，则你获得1点生命。若否，则CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。） {5}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌：派出一个已横置的3/2，红白双色的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Lorehold Pledgemage
trans-unit.target: 衡鉴证法师

trans-unit.source: First strike\nMagecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The weight of history can empower you or it can crush you. It's your choice."
trans-unit.target: 「历史之重能赐你力量，也能将你压垮。端看你如何抉择。」

trans-unit.source: Maelstrom Muse
trans-unit.target: 涡心缪思

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is CARDNAME's power as this ability resolves.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你本回合中施放的下一个瞬间或法术咒语减少{X}来施放，X为于此异能结算时CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.source: She's an inspiration to everyone, even herself.
trans-unit.target: 她是所有人的灵感源泉，包括她自己。

trans-unit.source: Magma Opus
trans-unit.target: 至炫熔彩

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.\n{U/R}{U/R}, Discard CARDNAME: Create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意数量的目标造成共4点伤害，你可以任意分配。横置两个目标永久物。派出一个4/4，蓝红双色的元素衍生生物。抓两张牌。 {U/R}{U/R}，弃掉CARDNAME：派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: STX·204 | Make Your Mark | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who do learn from history may still choose to repeat it.
trans-unit.target: 从历史中学到教训的人，仍可能选择去重演历史。

trans-unit.source: The first thing a Quandrix mage learns is the laws of metaphysics. The second thing is how to break them.
trans-unit.target: 量析法师要学习的第一项内容，便是形上学哲理。第二项内容便是如何打破它们。

trans-unit.source: Trample, lifelink
trans-unit.target: 践踏，系命

trans-unit.source: Necroluminescence is common among the undead creatures of Sedgemoor, giving the midnight swamp an eerie glow. It's comforting—from a distance.
trans-unit.target: 蓑草原上的不死生物大多会发出死冥磷火，令午夜时分的沼泽四处都有怪异幽光。看起来却也令人安心～只要你别靠近。

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you gained life this turn.\nDestroy target nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: 如果你本回合中获得过生命，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。 消灭目标非地永久物。

trans-unit.source: "Death is my life's work."
trans-unit.target: 「我毕生心血只为实现死亡。」

trans-unit.target: 幼年龙兽在学习飞行时，往往会不小心穿透树木、山崖以及没留神的学生。

trans-unit.source: "May Ganathog bless us with bloody visions of glory restored!"
trans-unit.target: 「愿噶纳索予吾人荣耀复兴的血腥视像！」

trans-unit.source: "Aim higher next time."

trans-unit.target: 「第一步：把害虫埋入土中。 第二步：等着。」 ～*《纪尧姆育虫导论》*

trans-unit.target: 冰火双子分头研究能够击败埃陀斯的咒语：威尔习图书。萝婉袭他物。

trans-unit.source: "No one ever created great art by playing it safe!"

trans-unit.source: Many have the talent to create, but few have the courage to share their creations.

trans-unit.target: 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以展示其中的一张地牌，并将该牌置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: STX·250 | Zimone, Quandrix Prodigy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What are they complaining about? It's not like axiomatic leyline paratrigonometrics is hard."
trans-unit.target: 「他们在抱怨什么？公理系地脉对三角学又不难。」

trans-unit.target: 茂典阁助手

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多一张目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining."\n—Isabough of the Biblioplex
trans-unit.target: 「非常感谢你的帮忙，老实说，看着很有趣。」 ～茂典阁的伊瑟伯

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，然后洗牌，并将该牌置于牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "There's nowhere in Strixhaven I can't find. Where do you need to go?"
trans-unit.target: 「斯翠海文没有我不知道的地方。你们要去哪？」

trans-unit.resname: STX·253 | Codie, Vociferous Codex | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Codie, Vociferous Codex

trans-unit.resname: STX·253 | Codie, Vociferous Codex | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You can't cast permanent spells.\n{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 你不能施放永久物咒语。 {4}，{T}：加{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}。本回合中，当你施放你的下一个咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值小于前述咒语的瞬间或法术牌为止。直到回合结束，你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所有以此法放逐的其他牌依随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

[+1]: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
